entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:39 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
